title: Convert files into PDF and back again with PDF Converter Pro — now just $30
content:
Macworld

People prefer to send and receive documents in PDF format. Despite its popularity, however, converting files can be a challenge — Particularly without the right software. So we’re offering lifetime licenses to PDF Converter Pro at a discounted price. It’ll let you easily turn a variety of file types into PDFs and, since it’s on sale, it won’t break the bank.

With a 4.4 out of 5-star rating on Trustpilot, PDF Converter Pro may be one of the better options out there as far as file conversion software goes. Not only does it let you convert a wide range of file types into PDF, it also gives you the ability to turn PDF files into other formats such as Word documents, imaging files, Excel spreadsheets, and more. 

If you transfer documents between team members and want to maintain the visual integrity of those files, then PDF Converter Pro is a must-have. It’s compatible with both Mac and Windows computers, and all future updates are included with your purchase. And since you can get it for way less than usual, it’s something that’s definitely worth picking up right now.

Get a PDF Converter Pro Lifetime License on sale for just $29.99.
